details.brokersummary:
Spacious 3 Bed / 2 Bath with Private Backyard in Bushwick
This beautifully redone 3-bedroom, 2-bathroom apartment offers modern finishes and outdoor space in a fantastic location near Myrtle Ave, just minutes from the J/M trains.
Open-concept kitchen with island, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher
In-unit washer & dryer
Bright living room with skylight and oversized windows
Comfortable, well-proportioned bedrooms
Central air throughout
Two full modern bathrooms with sleek marble tile
Private backyard perfect for entertaining or relaxing
Reach out to schedule a showing or request more info.

Modern 3 Bed / 2 Bath with Private Terrace ? 63 Suydam St #2
This beautifully renovated full-floor apartment offers style, space, and private outdoor access in the heart of Bushwick ? just a short walk from the J and M trains.
Open-concept kitchen with island, stainless steel appliances & dishwasher
In-unit washer & dryer
Bright living room with skylight and oversized windows
Comfortable, well-proportioned bedrooms
Central air throughout
Two full modern bathrooms with sleek marble tile
Private terrace ? perfect for relaxing or entertaining outdoors
Available now ? $4,800/month
Also available in the building:
Garden Unit: 3 Bed / 2 Bath with private backyard ? $5,000
3rd Floor Unit: 3 Bed / 2 Bath ? $4,800
Email to set up a showing or for more details

Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen, separate living room with natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, and renovated bathroom.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security Heat & hot water included NO BROKER FEE

Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains. The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious et-in style kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included and there is rooftop access.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
June 1 move in Small pets OK No broker fee

Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, Spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, Large living room, 1 queen size and 1 twin size bedroom. Heat & Hot Water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available April 1st Small pets OK No broker fee

Beautiful Williamsburg apartment is available June 1st!
- 2 very equal and BIG queen sized bedrooms - Real living room that fits a sofa /tv/coffee table and has natural light - Separate kitchen with full sized appliances
ELEVATOR BUILDING!
Because this property is in a prime location, you will be conveniently close to the J, M, and G trains! You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Small pets welcome 6/1 move in No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive!
Gorgeous 1.5 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: hardwood floors, spacious kitchen with stainless steel appliances, large living room, 1 queen size bedroom and 1 full size bedroom. Gorgeous exposed brick. Heat & Hot Water is included. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
Available June 1 On-Site Super Small pets OK

Awesome, renovated big 2-bedroom in Williamsburg right off the Subway!
Oak hardwood floors, high ceilings, and large windows letting in tons of natural light!
- Big bedrooms with closets - Renovated kitchen with stainless steel appliances - Elevator, On-Site Super - NO FEE! Only first & security.
Contact ASAP for more info and to schedule a showing! This apartment will not last!
June 1 move Small pets welcome No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Beautiful apartment in Williamsburg, prime location!
This 2 bedroom apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout.
You?ll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Westlight, Brooklyn Bowl, Extra Fancy, Lucky Dog, Baby?s All Right, Patrizia?s, Battery Harris, Post Office, and Freehold.
Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. Only # blocks from the L train, and a # minute walk to the JMZ trains
Available June 1st Small pets welcome No broker fee

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK 6/1 move in

Incredible 3 bedroom - right by the park!
- 3 bedrooms - 1 bath - hardwood floors - heat and hot water included
Around the corner from Prospect Park! Pasta Louise, Nighthawk Cinema, Dog Day Afternoon, Fonda, WINNER Cafe, Greenwood Park Bar, etc all nearby. Close to F and G trains for easy transportation.
No broker fee Available now SMALL pets OK

Large 2BR with queen size rooms, large balcony and huge PRIVATE roof deck and private balcony. Common area big enough for a couch, tv and dining table. The unit features stainless steel appliances including dishwasher and microwave, hardwood floor, white tile kitchen backsplash and bathroom, individual a/c units in each room. Spiral staircase to a small room which opens to your own private roof deck. The building features an elevator, laundry room, roof deck, zip car, security system, and is located in the center of Bushwick!
Building also features 2 large shared roof decks and a laundry room. Parking and zip car services available. Elevator
1/2 a block from the Dekalb L and 5min walk to the M train. NO fee
Call or text to take a look right away!

Virtual tours available!Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location!This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Archie's, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

2br / 1bath with laundry in the building and roof deck! Huge windows in the bedrooms (south facing) Cutout window to bring more light into the large living room Butcher block countertops Hardwood floors Dishwasher Microwave Roof deck Laundry in the building Faces away from the street
NO fee Pets ok Just 1st and security to move in Call or text to see right away!

Lovely two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Bushwick. The apartment features hardwood floors throughout and a renovated kitchen with stainless steal appliances and butcher block bar/island. The large bedrooms have plenty of natural light to start your morning off right. The building is pet friendly and has laundry facility in the basement so no need to haul those heavy laundry bags. Great location just one block from Maria Hernandez Park, Jefferson L train stop and surrounded by popular taverns and cafes. No fee!

2 Bed CORNER UNIT Penthouse with amazing views ready for immediate move in!
Please see video on StreetEasy ad or send message and I?ll send to you!
Unit features: Hardwood floors Vaulted ceiling Gas fireplace Top floor of elevator building. 2 elevator bays make sure you never have to wait! Corner apartment with TONs of natural light Kitchen island perfect for setting up stools for dining Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath Efficient PTAC heat and cooling unit for all rooms Large windows throughout bringing light into the entire apartment Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closets
Building features: Affordable parking spots available ButterflyMX intercom Multiple laundry rooms Huge Roof deck with spectacular skyline views Zipcars available Bike storage Go lockers for secure package delivery State-of-the-art security system throughout
Fantastic location close to tons of local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok NO FEE! Just 1st and security to move in! Guarantors welcome. $20 app fee per person
Call or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Stunning 2.5 bedroom Bushwick apartment allows for tons of natural light to help you start your morning off right. Enjoy hosting gatherings on your shared roof top deck or relax on your Private balcony!
This pet friendly building offers a laundry facility so no need to haul those bags. The apartment features a modern kitchen with stainless steal appliances, black cabinetry, tiled back splash and plenty of counter space. The large windows throughout the unit allow for plenty of natural light to flow in. Located 1 block to the L train (Dekalb stop) and 3 blocks to the M line (knickerbocker) Parking spots available in covered garage for $300/mo. Also has zip car services!
NOTE: One of the bedrooms (middle room) does not have a window to the outside, just a cutout to the living room and other bedroom bringing in light. This is often used as an office or spare room. However it has been used as a 3br before and is great for a group of 3 friends who has few belongings but wants to be in prime location right off the Morgan L for a great price. Someone usually just pays less for the smaller room.
SEE VIDEO. (if you can?t see video please message and I can send to you)
Building features Elevator, Roof deck with skyline views, and laundry room Unit features : Dishwasher, Balcony, Hardwood floors, Stainless steel appliances , balcony and slate countertops.
An incredible location , 5min to the Morgan L , 6min to the Jefferson L, 10min to the Flushing JMZ and 12min to Central M .
Pets ok NO FEE Call or text to take a look right away!!

Fabulous 3 bedroom / 2 full bathroom apartment with HUUUUGE outdoor patio! On the border of Bushwick / East Williamsburg! 5 minute walk to the Morgan (L) train. Invite 40 friends to hang our on your massive outdoor patioI Yes this is a very special feature no other buildings have. This is shared with 2 other apartments and is over 2500 SQ FT, you can put up dividers so subsection your portion of this if you want. Pet friendly!
Features: - Elevator - Laundry Room - Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan - Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances - Hardwood floors - Garage with Zip Cars and parking spots available for extra (negotiable) - Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient
Pets ok! NO Broker fee Call or text to view right away!

2 bed 1 bath in prime Bushwick!
- Hardwood floors
Available 6/1 No fee

Newly renovated 3 bedroom!
No fee
1.5 bath Hardwood floors Stainless steel appliances
Incredible location - Morgan L, Jefferson L, Central M trains. Gold Sounds, Little Whiskey, Associated Grovery, House of Yes, etc nearby.
June 1 move in Pets OK with approval

Stock photos!
Beautiful studio in prime Williamsburg, WD in unit!!
The Residences Featuring :
-Stainless steel appliances, including a dishwasher -Custom Italian kitchens with matching cabinets -High ceilings -Hardwood floors -Fully furnished Roof deck overlooking Manhattan Skyline -Laundry in unit -Bike storage -Virtual doorman
Reach out today before its gone!
Broker fee applies

Bright & Modern Apartment in a Charming Stuyvesant Heights Block ? Just Minutes to Manhattan!
Welcome to your new home in one of Brooklyn's most desirable neighborhoods! This beautifully updated apartment blends classic charm with modern conveniences, offering a stylish living space on a serene, tree-lined street in Stuyvesant Heights. Perfectly situated just minutes from Manhattan, this apartment boasts:
Exposed Brick: Adding character and warmth to your living space. High Ceilings: Creating a spacious and airy atmosphere. Hardwood Floors: Elegant, durable, and timeless. Video Intercom: Added peace of mind and security. Natural Light in the Living Area: Sun-drenched, bright, and welcoming. Eat-In Kitchen: Perfect for meals and gatherings with a view. Stainless Steel Appliances: Sleek, modern, and ready for your culinary adventures. Dishwasher: For effortless clean-up after meals. Gas Stove: Ideal for cooking enthusiasts. Central Air: Stay comfortable year-round, no matter the weather. Stone Countertops: Stylish and easy to maintain. Convenient Location:
Minutes from public transportation, including Utica Av (A, C) and Gates Av (J) subway stations, making your commute a breeze. Don?t miss out on the opportunity to live in this vibrant neighborhood, with a unique mix of history, culture, and modern amenities right outside your door. Schedule a showing today!

Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

Beautiful 2-Bedroom with City Views in Stuyvesant Heights!
Located at 930 De Kalb Avenue, this 3-bedroom, 1-bath apartment combines modern comfort with historic charm in the heart of Stuyvesant Heights.
Apartment Highlights:
Spacious bedrooms with ample room Sleek bathroom with stylish finishes Unique design elements across floors Elegant white marble staircase Building Perks:
Rooftop with stunning Manhattan skyline views Surrounded by historic brownstones Quick 25-minute commute to the city Close to J, M, and Z trains for easy transit Simple application process; guarantors accepted.
Don?t miss out on this mix of modern amenities and classic charm in one of Brooklyn?s top neighborhoods! Schedule a visit today!

This charming one-bedroom apartment in Brooklyn offers a comfortable and inviting living space. Featuring ample natural light, a well-proportioned layout, and convenient amenities, it provides a cozy retreat in a vibrant neighborhood. Located on a quiet, tree-lined street, the home is within easy reach of local shops, dining, and public transportation. Perfect for those seeking both tranquility and accessibility in the heart of Brooklyn.

Welcome to a real HOME!
Entire floor of apartment located in truly the best location of Bushwick!
Rooms are all king sized with closets Massive living room space 1.5 bathroom Heat & hot water included Strict - no pets 7/1 move in

The Residences at 1127 Flatbush Avenue sit conveniently at the intersection of two of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods?Prospect Lefferts Gardens and Ditmas Park. If luxury is what you seek, then life at 1127 Flatbush is one you can afford.
Designed with its residents in mind, 1127 Flatbush offers 360 degree rooftop views of Brooklyn, Manhattan and Queens, which are only an elevator ride away from your green communal courtyard, laundry room, on-site storage lockers, and fully secure bike room.
Each apartment?s layout is a thoughtfully considered balance of space and light. Studio, one, and two bedrooms are all apportioned with in-unit climate control, dishwashers, and stainless steel appliances. Many units also provide private outdoor space overlooking the bustling neighborhood below.
Lifestyle 1127 Flatbush provides an authentic Brooklyn experience, sitting at a cultural crossroads representative of its borough. A short distance from Brooklyn?s Prospect Park, the King?s Theater and Ditmas Park?s restaurant, shopping and nightlife-fueled Cortelyou Road, residents at 1127 Flatbush will enjoy not having to go far from home to experience the best of Brooklyn.

Amazing location blocks from Prospect Park in Prospect Lefferts Gardens. Feel the history of Brooklyn on brownstone-lined streets and in locally owned bars, restaurants, coffee shops and more. Not only will you have the chance for somewhat of a city escape, but you will still have everything you need around you with full size grocers, pharmacies, bodegas, liquor stores, retail shops, tattoo shops, whatever your heart desires! You won?t be miss out on any luxuries inside your new home at The Ballgreen Complex either! Fully equipped with all a renter could need in NYC. Come on by and take a look with us!
Conveniently located off the 2, 5, and Q trains, as well as the B12, B35, B44, and B49 bus lines.
UNIT FEATURES: Hardwood Floors Stainless Steel Kitchen Central A/C and Heat Excellent light from extra large windows
BUILDING FEATURES: Elevator Fitness Center Laundry Room Tenant Lounge Finished Roof Deck Parking (by availability) Virtual Doorman

Charming 3-Bedroom Apartment in Classic Brooklyn Brownstone
Welcome to this beautiful 3-bedroom apartment located in a classic Brooklyn brownstone, right in the heart of Bed-Stuy. With the A/C lines at Ralph Avenue and the J at Chauncey Street just moments away, commuting is a breeze. Bed-Stuy is full of culture, history, and vibrant local spots.

Spacious kitchen with attached living room
Large master bedroom + additional cozy bedroom

Modern, tiled bathroom
